= car2go API v1.0 =

|| *Name* || *Method* || *Url* || ||
|| Get free vehicles || GET || http://www.car2go.com/api/V1.0/ulm/vacant or http://www.car2go.com/api/V1.0/austin/vacant || *deprecated* ||
|| Get parking spots || GET || http://www.car2go.com/api/V1.0/ulm/parking or http://www.car2go.com/api/V1.0/austin/parking || *deprecated* ||
|| Get gas station || GET || http://www.car2go.com/api/V1.0/ulm/gas or http://www.car2go.com/api/V1.0/austin/gas || *deprecated* ||
|| Get reserverd vehicle || GET || http://www.car2go.com/api/V1.0/ulm/reserved/[code] or http://www.car2go.com/api/V1.0/austin/reserved/[code] || *deprecated* ||


Response is provided in KML format. More information can be found here:
[http://code.google.com/intl/de/apis/kml/documentation/kmlreference.html KML Reference at code.google.com]
